title: Can't add contacts to Thunderbird address book
content:
I have been trying to add a new contact to Personal Address book. This process refuses to complete through the "New Contact" panel. However, I have Thunderbird set to add addresses from all sent emails to the address book, and if I send that same person an email, the email address does get added to contacts list.

I very rarely use the "Add Contact" process, so I don't know how long this fault has been present.

Any help please?
creator: vousden

title: How to restore local folders when upgrading from windows 10 to windows 11
content: I upgraded from windows 10 to 11 My son was able to recover my e-mail folders, but some large folders are missing and the remainder only have e-mails from 2019 or earlier. How do I recover those e-mails? I am no longer conversant with the current technology or terminology. I need simplistic instructions.
creator: morleyverdier1

title: メールの今までの履歴を検索してもリロード中になってしまいます。
content: トラブルシューティング情報より、プロファイルフォルダー内のglobal-messages-db.sqliteを消去する方法は試しましたが、変わりません。
creator: support03
